item.title: Pratical Cheatsheet for Python Data Analysis
item.author: runqiyang@gmail.com (Runqi Yang)
item.description: It’s not just another cheatsheet. It only lists most frequent and important methods in a machine learning project with CAUTIONS and TIPS. It also covers some other useful tools like bcolz and Jupyter notebook widgets.
